content:
From: Mathias Fleury <mathias.fleury12@gmail.com>
Hi all,

Hans-Jörg noticed that registering on the mailing list is currently not
available -- it produces an error message. If I go to
https://mailmanbroy.informatik.tu-muenchen.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
and try to subscribe by giving an email address, I get the following error:

»Forbidden

You don't have permission to access this resource.«

Does anyone know what is going on?

Thanks,

Mathias Fleury

From: Peter Lammich <lammich@in.tum.de>
This is strange. I used to be admin of this list, but find myself
locked out from the admin interface!

@Manuel: have you changed the passwords or settings?

From: Manuel Eberl <eberlm@in.tum.de>
I didn't do anything, and I was able to log into the admin interface a
few days ago without any problems.

Peter privately told me it works again for him now, so perhaps those who
were affected should try again.

Manuel

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
Thanks for alerting us. Should be back to nomal now.

Tobias
smime.p7s
